scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../../part2/phonebook/ && npm run build && cp -r build ../../part3/phonebook-backend/
scripts.heroku:push: git add -A && git commit -m 3.21 && cd ../../ && git subtree push --prefix part3/phonebook-backend/ heroku master
scripts.deploy: npm run build:ui && npm run heroku:push
